A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Many people are saying that this movie is not a Star Wars movie\, but I disagree. Things change with time. Characters aren't static. If all the characters from the OT hadn't changed at all as they grew old\, that would be pretty dumb. This movie had some good action\, scenes\, and story beats\, but it was bogged down a bit by some characters from the last movie that didn't really need to be in this one and some spots where the humor was kind of tonally unaware.
